name: beanstalk-dashboard-for-chrome
description: A chrome app to inspect beanstalk queues

scripts.watch: npm run-script compile && npm run-script watch-js & npm run-script watch-npm & npm run-script watch-css
scripts.compile: npm run-script cleanup && npm run-script compile-js && npm run-script compile-css
scripts.compile-js: npm run-script minify-ui && npm run-script minify-bg
scripts.cleanup: rm -Rf ./css && rm -Rf ./js && mkdir js && mkdir css
scripts.package: rm ./package.zip && zip -r ./package.zip js/ css/ img/ manifest.json window.html
